boss_defeat: ^The mighty foe lies defeated at your feet. The residents gather around, their faces filled with gratitude and awe. One of the elders steps forward.
^"Your bravery has saved us all. From now on, you shall be known by a name fitting of your heroism. What shall we call you?"

c-0: ^The elder nods. "The Savior it is. May your deeds be remembered for generations to come."
c-1: ^The elder smiles. "The Guardian, protector of our land. A title well deserved."
c-2: ^The elder raises a hand in salute. "The Champion! Your strength and courage are unmatched."
